oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic research - driven and directed by funders?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Woodward, Lawrence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
Knowledge management
Research communication and quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report was presented at the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference. This paper describes and evaluates organic research in general.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Woodward, Lawrence (2002) Organic research - driven and directed by funders? In: Powell, Jane and et al., (Eds.) Proceedings of the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference, Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth, pp. 7-12.
